reference.shortdesc: The trademarklist element references a topic that contains a list of trademarks within the book.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: This element indicates to the processing software that the author wants a list of trademarks generated at the particular location. If no href attribute is specified on the trademarklist element, an external processor might generate a list of trademarks at this location.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The trademarklist element is specialized from topicref; it is defined in the bookmap module.
